All Classes

  • Class Description
    AIMinMax
    The AIRandomPlayer class represents a AI player that updates the board based one alpha beta algorithm.
    AIRandomPlayer
    The AIRandomPlayer class represents a AI player who plays randomly
    Board
    The Board class represents a game state for checkers.
    CheckerBoard
    The CheckerBoard class is a graphical user interface component that is capable of drawing any checkers gameState state.
    CheckersWindow
    The CheckersWindow class is responsible for managing a window.
    GameManager
    The GameManager represents a sort of referee for a Checker game.
    GameState
    The GameState class represents a game of checkers and ensures that all moves made are valid as per the rules of checkers.
    HumanPlayer
    The HumanPlayer class represents a user of the checkers game that can update the game by clicking on tiles on the board.
    Main  
    MatchResult
    The MatchResult enum represents all the possible match outcomes.
    Move
    The Move class represents a move and contains a weight associated with the move.
    MoveType
    The MoveType enum represents all the possible move types.
    OptionPanel
    The OptionPanel class provides a user interface component to control options for the game of checkers being played in the window CheckersWindow.
    Player
    The Player class is an interface class that represents a player in a game of checkers.
    SmartScroller
    The SmartScroller will attempt to keep the viewport positioned based on the users interaction with the scrollbar.
    State
    The State class interface for game state classes.
